headline.main: U.S. Plans a Major Health Report

docs.abstract: HEW Sec Califano says agency is ready to crack down on colls that lack equal sports programs for women although those schools probably will not lose Fed funds in Sept (S)
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, July 12 (UPI)--The Surgeon General will issue a major report this fall designed to help Americans fight against obesity, alcoholism and many other costly everyday health problems, the Secretary of Health, Education and Welfare, Joseph A. Califano Jr., said today.
